p: To evaluate the cytotoxic effect of C. fistula leaf methanolic extract, THP-1 differentiated macrophages were incubated at twofold serial dilution (0–1000 μg/mL), and the viability was assessed by the MTT assay. C. fistula was found safe and least cytotoxic on human macrophages with a CC 50 of 626 ± 39 μg/mL, while the standard available control drug miltefosine has a CC 50 value of 7.133 ± 0.65 μg/mL ( Figure 5 A).
